title: The Broken Compressor
summary: A man tries to beat the heat by using fans and an air conditioner, but a mysterious bang leads to a chilling discovery.
image_description: An apartment with open windows and a broken air conditioner compressor lying on the ground outside.
passage: The days were hot. The nights were hot. He turned on the living room fan. He turned on the dining room fan. Both fans were on high speed. They made a lot of noise. But they didn't blow cool air. They blew hot air. They blew hot air everywhere. He turned off the fans. He turned on the air conditioner. He closed all the windows. He closed the front door. The apartment began to cool down. It got cooler and cooler. Then he heard a bang. It was a loud bang. He thought a plane had crashed onto the roof. But it wasn't a plane. It was the air conditioner compressor. It had broken down. He opened the door. He opened the windows.
